newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Dillon Read starts three insurers.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Dillon Read starts three insurers.

text.p: Dillon Read said analyst Michael Lewis initiated coverage of Mutual Risk Management Ltd with a buy rating and American International Group Inc with an outperform rating.
-- The firm said analyst Harry Radovich initiated coverage of Marsh & McLennan Cos Inc with a neutral rating.
-- Lewis estimates Mutual Risk's earnings at $2.30 a share for 1997 and $2.70 a share for 1998. He set a 12-18 month price target of $48. Mutual Risk closed Wednesday at 39.
-- Lewis estimates American International's earnings at $6.85 a share for 1997 and $7.80 a share for 1998. Set a 12-18 month price target of $140. AIG closed Wednesday at 130-7/8.
-- Radovich estimates Marsh & McLennan's earnings at $7.10 a share for 1997 and $8.40 a share for 1998.
